nodes.title: Choose the angle where to apply the watermark
Note+ (mtb)
widgets_values:
Testo formattato

WARNING!!!

___________

Do not Modify anything in the nodes below this Note.
You risk making the WorkFlow no longer work.

the ImageEffectAdjustment is used to enhance the cropping of the signature, logo or watermark.

the current settings 
Brightness : 1.20 
Contrast : 1.20 
Saturation : 0.00 
hue : 0.50 
gamma : 2.28 
sharpness : 0.80 
RGB : 1-1-1

are optimal for a black signature on a white background
once you have uploaded the signature or watermark, and inserted the base image, start the workflow, select on the image chooser the corner on which you want to apply the signature or watermark.
